title: Unexpected Reboot or Shutdown
description: Troubleshoot sudden auto-restarts and unexpected computer shutdowns.

steps.title: Disable Auto-Restart
steps.instruction: Right-click 'This PC' → Properties → Advanced System Settings → Startup and Recovery → Uncheck 'Automatically restart'. This reveals the error code instead of rebooting.

steps.title: Check Power Settings
steps.instruction: Control Panel → Power Options → Change plan settings → Advanced → Processor power management → Set Max to 99% to prevent thermal spikes.

steps.title: Verify PSU Connectivity
steps.instruction: Ensure the power cable is firmly seated in the wall and the PC. Use a UPS if your local power is unstable.

steps.title: Check CPU Temperature
steps.instruction: Use 'Open Hardware Monitor'. If CPU exceeds 90°C, the system will shut down to prevent permanent damage.

steps.title: Update BIOS/Firmware
steps.instruction: Check the manufacturer website for BIOS updates. Firmware fixes often address power delivery and stability bugs.
